sentences.english: I will send the quotation sheet and samples to you immediately after receiving your detailed enquiry .
sentences.chinese: 在收到你方具體詢價時，我將立即寄上報價單及樣品。

sentences.english: Please send us a pattern - book and quote the lowest price for sateen .
sentences.chinese: 請寄橫貢緞樣品簿和最優惠報價單。

sentences.english: The Demander shall provide a price quotation form format to the Supplier.
sentences.chinese: 需方向供方提供產品報價單格式。

sentences.english: Can you give me a quotation for building a garage?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能給我一張建造一間汽車庫的報價單？

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we are sending you, under separate cover, our latest catalogue and price list covering our export range.
sentences.chinese: 謹遵要求另函送上最新之出口商品目錄和報價單。

sentences.english: All offers and sales are subject to the terms and conditions printed on the reverse side hereof.
sentences.chinese: 所有報盤和銷售均應遵守本報價單背面所印的條款。

sentences.english: In compliance dawn ywe request, we are not sending you, under separate cover, we latest catalogue or price list covering we export range.
sentences.chinese: 謹遵要求另函奉上最新之出口商品列表和報價單。

sentences.english: Are the price on the list firm offers?
sentences.chinese: 報價單上的代價是實價嗎？

sentences.english: We shall appreciate your forwarding us samples and the relative price list.
sentences.chinese: 我們將感謝你方寄來樣品和有關報價單。

sentences.english: Could you give me a price list today?
sentences.chinese: 你今天能給我一份報價單嗎？

sentences.english: Quotation, price list, proforma invoice and so forth all be be used in an "offer".
sentences.chinese: 報價單，價格單，形式發票等都可以用作“發盤”。

sentences.english: We can meet your requirements and the offer is ready for you.
sentences.chinese: 我們能夠滿足你們的要求，報價單已經爲您準備好了。

sentences.english: The apostle alertly made a citation for the limited control motors.
sentences.chinese: 發起人立即造了一份遙控馬達的報價單。

sentences.english: We enclose herewith our detailed quotation.
The insurance company requires three quotations for repairs to the car.
sentences.chinese: 保險公司要三家修理這輛汽車的報價單。

definition: to be transferred to another post/to post away
